First up, the classic steak.

That way you've got more

Whilst our steak rests, I'm

Today to go with our steak,
I'm gonna do peppercorn sauce, classic

That ratio is one part spirit,
two parts double cream,
three parts stock.
Plus you can add in a flavour.

Today we're doing the
peppercorns but you could

or sautéed mushrooms

So first in goes your one part spirit.

Today I'm using brandy but
you could use whiskey or rum.

something like vodka

and that scoops up all the
